conversation_history.content: Hello! Welcome to the Employment Verification System. Let's start by collecting some information. What is your full name?
my full name is John Doe
Nice to meet you, my! How many years of experience do you have?
I have totally 5.2 years of experience
Great! What is your date of birth? Please say it in a format like day, month, year.
Thank you, my! Now, please provide your email address so I can check our records.
Hi my, it's great to talk with you! Our records show you work at Tech Innovations Inc. Is that still correct?
No worries, my! Could you please tell me your current company name?
current company is Oscar or Digital Private Limited
Thank you! I've recorded your company as current company is Oscar or Digital Private Limited. Your verification is complete, my!
You're very welcome, John! Thank you for your time, and have a fantastic day!
